column4: When I try to upgrade the package dpkg I get the error "Package dpkg is not available, but is referred to by another package. This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or is only available from another source However the following packages replace it: coreutils manpages-de dselect dpkg-dev"
and ubotu : ok, i will try it .. :)
and ubotu : i tried k9copy but the problem is the video size is too small and the audio is not available .. how to setting it?
